snippet: The World Health Organization declared Liberia free of Ebola for a second time on Thursday, several months after it was first thought to have halted the virus in May.
abstract: World Health Organization declares Liberia Ebola-free for second time after brief resurgence of disease.
lead_paragraph: The World Health Organization declared Liberia free of Ebola for a second time on Thursday, several months after it was first thought to have halted the virus in May.

headline.main: Liberia: Ebola-Free, for a Second Time
headline.print_headline: Africa; Liberia: Ebola-Free, for a Second Time
